mapper.select: SELECT B.SNO AS SNO ,A.MID AS MID ,D.MNICK AS CHEFNICK ,B.SINSERTDATE AS SINSERTDATE FROM MEMBER A, SUB_INFO B, CHEF_INFO C, MEMBER D WHERE A.MNO = B.MNO AND B.INO = C.INO AND C.MNO = D.MNO AND A.MNO = #{mno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.SDELETEYN = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SUB_INFO ( SNO ,MNO ,INO ,SINSERTDATE ,SUPDATEDATE ,SDELETEYN ) VALUES ( #{sno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{mno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{ino, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,SYSDATE ,SYSDATE ,'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(A.SNO) as SUBCOUNT FROM SUB_INFO A, CHEF_INFO B WHERE A.INO = B.INO AND B.INO = #{ino, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.SDELETEYN = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE SUB_INFO SET SDELETEYN = 'N' ,SUPDATEDATE = SYSDATE WHERE SNO = #{sno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
